comments.body: In Blink, we called this class an EventDispatcher.
Yeah, that was my original name here too. I renamed it to this so that it was more consistent with the other related interfaces. (HitTestTarget would be EventTarget by Web standards too.)
is there any reason to expose it at all?
It's used by the testing harness to do non-trivial things.  We could expose an iterator instead, but there's no reason not to allow random access.
